item.title:
Youtube Video Editor Politics/Celebrity Niche
- Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a youtube video editor who can edit videos. (Example provided below). We are hoping for a long-term relationship.

Job Summary
- $5 Per Video (30+ Videos Monthly) + Performance Bonus
- Must be active daily and quick response time
- Video 8-10 mins long
- If you can we will do 2-3 videos daily

My team's main objective is speed we only want to work with fast people who can be quick and keep a high video quality. As the channel grows your pay will rise so your performance will influence how much you get paid. Presets will be provided you just have to put the clips together hence the $5 per video

These are the channels I would like you to take inspiration from to give you a better understanding of what our team desires from the editor.

Types of videos you will be making:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e0sgNzRVUx8

Respond with "Politics" & a Sample so I know you have read the description

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 15, 2024 14:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.description:
Hey everyone, we are looking for a Talented YouTube Video Editor to join our Automation Team! Must be flexible in niches as you will handle different niches.

MUST KNOW AROUND COPYRIGHT

Please send a example or portfolio, videos you made, previous channels you worked on,

item.title: Video Graphics Designer for Fiber Telecom Route Project - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Freelance Video Graphics Designer to develop an engaging and informative video that showcases our new fiber telecom route from Kuwait through Iraq to Turkey and Frankfurt. This video will be a key marketing tool for our company, illustrating the technical details and strategic advantages of our new route.

:::::::::
Develop a storyboard that effectively communicates the journey of the fiber telecom route.
Create visually compelling graphics and animations that highlight key features and benefits of the route.
Ensure the video aligns with our brand guidelines and maintains a professional and technical tone.

'''''''''

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience working on projects related to telecommunications or infrastructure.
Knowledge of 3D modeling and animation software.
Ability to provide creative solutions and innovative ideas for video content.


Posted On: June 15, 2024 14:47 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Illustration, 3D Design, Adobe After Effects, 3D Modeling, Video Editing, 3D Rendering
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Illustration, 3D Design, Adobe After Effects, 3D Modeling, Video Editing, 3D Rendering
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Motion Designer for Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative Motion Designer to join our team on a part-time/freelance basis. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating 6 - 8 short engaging and visually appealing motion graphics per month for our social media platforms.

This videos would be simple, minimalistic and short. Candidates with experience in Tech/ SAAS industry are preferred

Key Responsibilities:

- Design and create high-quality motion graphics for social media content, including but not limited to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
- Collaborate with the marketing and content teams to understand project requirements and objectives.
- Conceptualize and execute creative ideas that align with our brand identity and campaign goals and more.

Requirements

- Proven experience as a Motion Designer or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing your skills and previous work.
- Proficiency in Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, Photoshop, Illustrator, and other relevant software.
- Strong understanding of motion principles, typography, color theory, and composition.
- Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with remote teams.
- Knowledge of social media trends and best practices for video content.

Submit your portfolio or include links to social media or motion graphics ads you have previously created.

Budget: $600
Posted On: June 15, 2024 14:34 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Advertisement, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Skills: Advertisement, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Country: Nigeria
click to apply

item.title: Youtube video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

I am looking for a skilled video editor to enhance our YouTube content. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, creativity, and the ability to meet deadlines.

Responsibilities:

- Find and edit high-quality stock footage/image
- Good quality soundtrack
- Add graphics, text, and effects to enhance content
- Ensure videos align with our brand style and voice
- Manage multiple projects and deadlines
- Incorporate feedback for revisions
- Stay updated with the latest video editing trends

Requirements:

- Proven experience with a portfolio of projects
- Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, or similar software
- Strong understanding of video formats and compression techniques
- Excellent communication and organizational skills
- Creativity and attention to detail











Budget: $35
Posted On: June 15, 2024 14:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Editing
Country: USA

item.title: Long-term project video editor TikTok - Upwork
item.description:
I need a video editor (tiktok niche: motivation/celebrity news/ storytelling/ general culture).

I provide a document sheet in which there will be: the audio for the video to be edited, and a reference video as an example of editing.

I need 1-2 video per day for each account. So I need 7-14 videos every Monday.

I currently make all the videos myself and I know how long it takes to edit them (30 minutes maximum per video).
So our collaboration is 15-30 hours (30-60 videos per month) for each Tiktok account.

As a video editor, you'll have to search for the images needed to make the video, and for video samples too, to combine photos and videos.

I have TikTok accounts in France and the US, so it's best to have someone who speaks both languages, if not one person for each language.

I need a very professional and available person.

If our collaboration is a success, I have students who are also interested in automating their video production, so there's a lot of work involved.

Hourly Range: $3.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 14:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Professional video editor to create a video trailer for a game project - 3-4 min - Upwork
item.description:
Create a video trailer 3-4 min from existing game footage. All video will be provided and some audio, but intermediate elements/transitions must be made by the creator. The script will be provided as well.  

1. First 2 min draft should be ready Sunday, 10 AM, GMT+2
2. Final 2 min final version should be ready Monday 12:00 AM

3. Final 3-4 minute trailer will be ready by the 20th.
We will work closely so he deadlines can be fulfilled

Budget: $100
